avalancheActivity.comment: A hiker triggered a small avalanche in Esjan on the 8th of Jan in a W-facing slope at around 400 m a.s.l. A small avalanche released in Reykjafell in Mosfellsbær on Jan 6th. Avalanches released on the evening of Jan 5th, over Grafningsvegur by Þingvallavatn, in Svínahlíð.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable. Sloght new snow forcasted the next days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw and rain the last days. Prior to the thaw, snowfall in variable directions formed small wind slabs in isolated spots in the mountains and gullies, while most areas had hard-packed, old, stable snow. A few small slabs released, and weak layers observed in snow pits indicated instability.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytileg átt og rigning eða slydda, jafnvel snjókoma um tíma á fimmtudag. Kólnandi veður. Austlæg átt og lítilsháttar úrkoma á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack has subsided and strengthened during thaw and rain. Avalanche danger is considered low.

snowpackStructure.highlights: During the recent mild weather and rain, the snow has melted, settled, and strengthened. Last week, layered wind slabs and persistent weaknesses were in mountains, but they are expected to have broken down, leaving the remaining snow uniform and isothermal. When temperatures drop on Thursday, the snow should stiffen and strengthen further.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Frystir á fimmtudag og lítilsháttar él eftir það.

avalancheActivity.comment: A snowmobile triggered an avalanche in Upsadalur west of Dalvik on Thursday January 9th. A natural avalanche fell in Dýjadalur, either on January 9th or 10th and a small slab in Klarsárdalur.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack has subsided and strengthened due to thaw. Cooling weather is forecast on Thursday with snowfall and snowdrift in the coming days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snowpack has settled during the mild weather, becoming more uniform and stronger. At high elevations, where the thaw has less impact, unstable wind slabs may still exist, especially in gullies and areas sheltered from SW and S winds. When temperatures drop below freezing point on Thursday, snow should stiffen and strengthen further. Snow that falls on top in the coming days may form new wind slabs.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Kólnar smám saman á fimmtudag, með slyddu og snjókomu í SV og breytilegum áttum. Lítilsháttar éljagangur á föstudag, en snjókoma í austanátt á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small wet avalanche released in Fannardalur the 12th of January.Two avalanches released in Bjólfur on january 7th and one small avalanche above Neskaupstaður.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw. Wind slabs may form in NE wind and snowfall on Saturday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw. Snowfall in NE wind is forcasted for all of Satuday and unstable wind slabs may form.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Continued thaw with consid. rain in the western part. Small wet avalanches or even slush flows may be expected.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægari vestlæg átt og úrkomulítið á fimmtudag og frystir. Norðlægari og él aðfaranótt föstudags en að mestu úrkomulaust yfir daginn. Bætir í snjó aðfaranótt laugardags í NA átt.
